analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of BCaaS._transfer (/unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol#234) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BCaaS._transfer (/unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol#234) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BCaaS._transfer (/unique_contracts/0x895b47ba4a24bbeaae7aa0ea88240c79c5efff72.sol#234-235) is not in mixedCase
